Detailed Description

Planner which plans a path to line kick a ball. Uses the System State object to get the position of the ball and predict its Path. It chooses the closest intersection point with the ball Path it can reach in time and plans a Path so the ball and robot intersect at the same time.

TODO(Kyle): Overhaul this entire planner. It's sketchy right now.

Plan a trajectory for this request. This is guaranteed to be a request that this planner is able to handle (according to is_applicable)
